title: Gal-31
summary: The Gal-31 is a tier 1 automatic rifle that can be bought in the NPC marketplace or found in graveyards. It is the model for the Galactic Green Blaster from the Roblox catalog.
full_text:
Gal-31
The Gal-31 is a tier 1 automatic rifle that can be bought in the NPC marketplace or found in graveyards. It is the model for the Galactic Green Blaster from the Roblox catalog.
